title: Euro firms must ditch Uncle Sam's clouds and go EU-native
author: jamesblonde
aiHeadline: European companies are told to kick Uncle Sam to the curb and switch to EU clouds, because apparently, your data privacy is just a side effect of their geopolitical chess game.

title: Finland looks to introduce Australia-style ban on social media
author: Teever
aiHeadline: Finland considers banning social media, proving once again that the only thing more dangerous than the internet is Finland's plan to save us from it.

title: Mobile carriers can get your GPS location
author: cbeuw
aiHeadline: Your mobile carrier already knows where you are, and now they’re just flaunting it, because privacy is apparently optional in 2026.

title: We have ipinfo at home or how to geolocate IPs in your CLI using latency
author: jimaek
aiHeadline: Geolocate any IP from your CLI? Sure, why not? Because nothing says 'I’m a tech wizard' like using command-line tools to track people down.

title: Automatic Programming
author: dvrp
aiHeadline: Automatic programming is here, and while it’s great for coders who want to take a coffee break, the rest of us are just waiting for the inevitable robot uprising.
